11.content:
(This chapter is a unification of two chapters, originally written by Drez - https://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/v... - and Past Member 'Red Hurricane', although I've added some additional choices)

Your name is Andrew Mercer and you live in a small town called Silver Creek out in the middle of nowhere. Silver Creek is named after a creek that has the same name that runs through the town. The town's population is perhaps 3,500. It was once a mining town back in the 1900s but the Great Depression effectively killed it; it's slowly turning into a ghost town now.

You're 24 years old have have short brown hair and average looks. You work at the only grocery store in town.

You just love to stargaze with the telescope you got one Christmas when you were sixteen. You never discovered anything awesome like a new planet or anything...not that you're looking to discover anything..you just like looking up at the night sky. You stargaze on a high hill that overlooks the town and the surrounding area.

One night you're stargazing through your telescope when you spot something coming out towards the woods and get curious. "Huh?" you ask. You home in a little closer and see that the creature coming out of the woods is somewhat large. It almost looks inhuman, but you can't get a clear look since the creature is in the shadows, but the one thing you know is that it doesn't look like any Earth animal you see.

You immediately run down to check out... whatever that thing was. You grab your coat along with a backpack and quickly throw in a flashlight along with a baseball bat, a hockey stick and some pucks. Then you remember to put in an air horn and super soaker in case the creature in question is hostile.

You make it to the outskirts of town and hide behind a chain link fence as you wait for the thing to come forward. From the looks of it the creature was bigger than a human and looked animalistic based on the shadow. The creature appeared to be breathing heavily, as if it was injured somehow. You take a closer look with your flashlight and get a good look and you can hardly believe what you see. The creature looked female in appearance but definitely was no human.

From the looks of it she was an anthropomorphic hippopotamus woman who had to stand exactly twelve feet tall and very heavy looking given her species. She had long red hair reaching down to her considerable rear and a red tattoo of what looked like claw marks and a crescent moon over one of her eyes. What was really freaky was than she was wearing what looked like a spacesuit with a red vest, blue speedo and black leggings and armlets. On her vest's shoulder was the same symbol that was tattooed over her eye and she seemed to be wearing some kind of belt along with a scouter like device at the side of her head.

The hippo woman then presses a button on the device. "This is Commander Barrah Nova of the thirteenth Star and Claw fleet calling home Planet Ju-O. My crew and I are stranded on an unknown planet. Not sure if natives are friendly or hostile, but from the looks of it, they don't do a very good job taking care of their planet. I am approaching a nearby village."

Aliens. Alien animals no less. This hippopotamus woman was obviously leading a crew of beast people flying over head when something happened. But why are these aliens here? What purpose? Are they friendly or hostile?

“Useless!?” Moona was interpreted by Jackie rising out of her chair at the sudden statement. “That gas they call ‘useless’ is the stuff that propelled us to a spacefaring empire! And they don’t do anything with it?!”

“We-we use it to treat people with cancer...that’s important right?” You offer your meek voice into the conversation, in an attempt for Jackie to stop criticizing your species. I’m going to head back to my quarters.” Captain Barrah declared, and rose out of her chair to do just that. Soon, Viola, Jackie, and sierra followed her out, having coming up with a similar excuse, leaving you and Moona alone.

“Hey Moona?” You pat the side of your navigator friend. “Why did everyone get so quiet when you said we had to go back to my home? I mean, I’m excited too, but-”

“It’s not that.” Moon shook her head and turned to face you. “Nothing is set in stone, but...when an exploration vessel finds something that may be of use to our race, it’s mandatory that they report back to Jo-Oh, where decide what to do with it.”

“...Wait…” You said slowly, coming to the realization. “You mean that Captain Barrah just left, to talk to your...your leaders i’m assuming, to tell them that Earth, my Planet, is rich in the source of fuel that drives your entire civilization?”

You Hippo friend gave a sheepish smile and rubbed the back of her chubby neck awkwardly. “That’s...about the gist of it, yeah.”

“So…” you said, a little bit shaken at the revelation that on this very ship, in a couple of rooms down from your position, Captain Barrah was deciding the fate of humanity. “What happens to Earth?”

Moona did not want to answer, but the face she was making told you enough. She looked down at you, the cute little human they found hiding in the bushes, the guy who was almost her first kiss, and smiled...

Instantly, and without thinking, you decided to speak up for yourself to prove that you could, indeed, talk. However, you would come to realize later that was a bad idea, as you felt a splitting headache start to come on.

"The economy of course...being of primary...concern..." you spoke, not really knowing what if was you were saying.

Captain Barranquilla made a displeased look. "Oh great, Jackie. You broke it."

"Oh, relax. I have him the serum, following protocal, he's perfectly fine. If anything, he faking it. Watch." You saw to your horror Jackie's heavy and padded foot slowly form a shadow over your body as she lifted it up above you.

Before you could offer even the slightest bit of protest, her foot came defending down on your body. Specifically, in your crotch. "See, he's perfectly-"

"AAAAAAAAAGGGGGHHHHH!!! WHYYYYY WOULD YOU DO THAT!?" You scream at the top of your lungs as you felt the most extreme pain in your entire life. Even the pain of Jackie sitting on you before she injected you with the endurance serum didn't even compare.

"...oops." Jackie said quietly as she saw you weigh in pain of the forest floor. "I thought he was stronger then that."

"Jackie. Get. Your. Foot. Off of his balls. Now." Captan Barrah instructed coldly. Wincing, she obeyed, lifting her pudgy foot off of your now definatley broken pelvis.

You felt yourself slowly black out, the pain being absolutley too much to bear. The last thing you saw was Captain Barrah's hand reaching out for your flailing body.




"Ugh, my head." You rubbed your head as you slowly woke up. You found yourself in a room, no longer in the forest. It was pure white all around, and the various sets of equipment scattered around you could only mean you were in some kind of infirmity. "Geeez, what happened?.. oh yeah, anthropomorphic hippo aliens from space. And an elaphant." Yiu tried getting up from your bed, but you felt a sharp pain in your crotch that kept you bound to your mattress.

"Ahh, your finnaly up. Good." You heard a voice from behind you speak. Heavy footfalls filled your ears as the owner of the voice came closer to you. You couldn't really hear well, still waking up, but as the figure came into vision, you could clearly see who it is...
1133111.title: Jackie reports her discovery to captain and crew

12.content:
You are Parker, as the youngest and least tenured member of the Ranger staff at a remote national park, you are given the worst possible shifts. That includes the one you are currently working solo, on President's Day. For most holidays, your park was incredibly busy making a full ranger staff very necessary. But based on your northern location, you saw very little activity on winter holidays due to the extreme cold.

You sat in the ranger station trying to keep your 5'8 body as warm as possible. Suddenly, you felt the whole station rattle! Your area was not prone to earthquakes, but this definitely felt like one. You rush out of the station to survey the damage. To your surprise, everything seems fairly normal. Then your eyes fell on something very out of shape. An enormous aircraft that dwarfed your ranger station had settled into a landing just a few yards from your door.

You rush back inside and pick up the phone inside the station to call for help, but drop the receiver as you find no dial tone. The wires are all connected fine, it seems like the craft is somehow interfering with your communications. You hear a noise outside, and wander back out the door to observe the strange craft.

A door has opened up and 5 statuesque creatures exited. You looked on in shock as they all have a resemblance to animals you are not unfamiliar with at your park. The exceptions are that they all are walking on their hind legs, have shapely feminine features, and all seem to eclipse at least 12 feet in height. They are also all dressed in some kind of form fitting space suits.

The tallest of the group, at over 15 feet tall, is a bear anthro. She had the thickest features, particularly in her strong legs and firm, round ass. Next in height was a stately deer, being female she lacked horns, but her slim waist led up to an incredible rack and tapered down to a full ass. Next in line was a shapely red fox, or a vixen in this case. She had a sly look on her face and her suit did little to hide her incredible curves. Following her was an intimidating looking skunk. Her long, bushy tail flowed out from behind her suit, leading to an enormous ass. She had the widest hips of the group, and you shuddered to think of the powerful smells it could deliver. Finally, the "smallest" one at just 12 feet tall was an incredibly curvaceous squirrel woman. She had thicker thighs than all but the but bear and the largest chest of the group.

You held the door open just a crack, allowing you to observe the alien visitors, hoping they hadn't seen you. Suddenly, one of their heads turns sharply, and she heads straight toward you and your station. Which anthro has spotted you?

123.content:
The vixen's mouth curled into a smile upon seeing you hiding out. But she wanted to keep you her little secret, at least for now.

"Ok everyone," she said to her ship mates, "We know there's a native somewhere in this area. Let's spread out and find him. But be careful, he's small. Don't let him slip past you."

The bear growled angrily, bristling at being given orders by someone smaller than her.

"Who suddenly nominated you to be captain Viv?"

Before the vixen could respond, the deer interrupted. "Easy Bella, Viv is right. We need to canvas the area and get out quickly," she said calmly.

Bella sighed in frustration, but stepped down. "Yes Captain," she said reluctantly.

Viv turned and her smile grew broad as she quickly made her way to the location she knew kept you hidden, the small ranger station. You locked the door and retreated to the center of the room. Unfortunately, the weak door wasn't built to keep out 13 foot tall anthros, and the vixen easy pushed her way in. Before you could scramble away, she was all but on top of you.

"Hello human," she said with a sadistic smile, putting her arm around you and holding you close to her shapely body.

"I'm Vivian, third ranking officer of the Starship Fanged Explorer. But I'm hoping that finding you might help bump me up to First Officer. It'll certainly score points with Captain Diana, and it would be significantly more than that brute Bella ever contributed." she said, getting slightly side tracked.

You are unable to respond, mostly because Vivian has your face pressed up firmly against her body. She realizes the reason for your silence and relaxes her grip enough to allow you to breathe. After catching your wind, you introduce yourself.

"I....I'm Parker," you begin nervously. "Wha....what are you doing here? What do you want?"

Vivian's smile grew. "What I want...is you."

That was all you needed to hear. You desperately tried to pull away from the fox, but even her relaxed grip was too much for you to break free from. Your escape attempt made her laugh.

"You're not going anywhere except back with me Parker. Now, the Captain did request us to be quick, so unfortunately I won't have the one on one time with you here I was hoping for," she said, rubbing her breast and crotch with her free hand. "But I'll find a way to get it later."

"I have a deal for you Parker," she continued, "Once you're back on board our ship, Captain Diana will ask you to select your overseer. Your...primary companion so to speak. Request me and obey me, and I promise you there will never be a day you regret it," she said, licking her lips seductively. "But request someone else, especially Bella, and I will use every ounce of energy I have to ensure your misery."

She smiles at you, waiting for you to respond. It's not as if she's really giving you much of a choice, but how much do you really want to trust this fox?
123.title: Found by the Fox

choices: Just makes you more durable.
Makes you more durable, but smaller!
Just makes you smaller!
1231.content:
"Fine." You answered, trying to sound confident and fooling no one. "You have a deal. But only if you can guarantee my safety. It's... I mean... I don't know your people." You finished lamely. "You have to promise that I won't be harmed."

Vivian looked surprised for a moment, and then, suddenly, laughed out loud. "Of course!" She chuckled, seeing you go pale and seemingly trying to reassure you. "Okay, tough guy, you have a deal" she teased, ducking back out of the station and bringing you with her, and then standing up to her full height again. She used her left arm to hold your back against her chest, and wrapped her right hand around your own. "I believe this is how you would seal it in your culture," she explained, pumping your arm up and down in a rough approximation of a handshake. You got over the initial shock and were about to answer, when suddenly she brought her head down, stuck her tongue out, and licked all over one half of your face.

"And that's how we'd seal it in mine!" She said cheerfully, while you sputtered and searched for words. She pressed you back against her suit and started walking immediately, and then lifted her free arm to start talking into what you can only assume is a comm device hidden around her wrist. "Recon to Captain, Vivian here." She said. "I've secured the package and am en route to LZ now. Request permission to board, over." Almost without delay, the suit beeped twice and flashed red around her forearm, shortly followed by the Captain's voice. "Captain to Vivian, permission granted. Over."

Once the comm went silent, you looked up, thinking to ask your captor about her companions. Before you could say anything, however, her wrist lit up and started beeping again. "Captain to star-pack," said the voice. "Mission complete. All hands, report to conference room for debriefing and reassignment. Over." "Vivian to Captain," the vixen answered. "Confirmed. Over. Confused?" She added, looking down at you as she walked into the clearing where their ship was parked. "Let me explain..."

The ship's interior turned out to be every bit as massive as it appeared from the outside, and even Vivian's 13-foot stride needed a couple of minutes to cover the distance to the conference room. Most of the trip was by a single hallway, with plain, featureless doors made of some dull, tan-colored metal lining the walls at regular intervals. As you went, she briefly told you about their voyage.

According to Vivian, they were a part of the Pan-Arboro Systems Alliance, sent to study and document one of a number of planets suspected to harbor alien life. At first, they'd thought that Earth was too dense a planet to expect anything out of, and the voyage would be just a routine check and return. Instead, it seems, they showed up several months ago to find that life-forms here were very similar to their own, and had simply evolved to be much smaller to offset the higher gravity. She said that studying your species' tech and culture had taken much longer than expected, and, being strictly forbidden to reveal themselves in any way, the crew had quickly grown restless from being cooped up on the ship, stuck together in orbit for day after day without pause.

"Especially since it's all ladies, here. Ugh, don't even get me started." She continued, rolling her eyes. "The guys all wanna sign up for invasio- well, anyway. Long story short, we were always gonna bring one of you back with us when we were done here. Part of the end-game was to see if we can cooperate with whatever species we find, so the first step is seeing how you get along as a part of our crew." She started petting you absentmindedly, rubbing your head with her palm as you tried your best to process all of that. This was a big deal! Your actions here could very well serve as the basis for your entire species' intergalactic relations! ...and so far, you've been licked, abducted, and petted, in no particular order. You really hoped it was just a cultural thing. Your legs dangled freely, forgotten, as Vivian turned the final corner to your destination.

"And that's where you come in," she finished. "It's a bit early, but when we picked up your bio-readings so far out from any others, with an open window for getting in and out unobserved, well..." She slapped her hand on the door at the end of the hall, which popped right open to reveal a large, open room with a massive round table in the center, and several figures loitering around it. "Welcome to the crew."

There were four other women already inside the room when you entered, and Vivian introduced them all after setting you atop the table and taking a seat right behind you. Surprisingly, all of these looked mostly human, but for a few key points. According to Vivian, this was because they were part of a slightly different race from her home planet, known as "chimera types" to her people. "Careful," she warned. "They may look a lot like you, but I assure you, they're not. They're more... wild, than the rest of us."

First was Bellatrix, the cook. She's a slender 12-foot tall woman in a spacesuit like Vivian's, with long brown hair, a nervous manner, and a pair of long, brown rabbit ears protruding from her head. She looked away quickly after saying hi, and started scratching an ear with one of her hands.

Next was Monica, the ship's mechanic. She's an easy 13 feet or more, though it's hard to be exact because she's perched atop a stool, squatting with her feet underneath her, showing you a muscular build with a medium bust and lithe, well-toned buttocks. Wearing a spacesuit so tattered as to be almost unrecognizable, Monica has short red hair and an easy smile - so easy, in fact, that you noticed her carefree manner just before you registered that she also had the feet and tail of a chimpanzee. "Lil' guy like you might come in handy in the engine room," she noted cheerfully. "Y'should swing by sometime, I'll show ya 'round!" Then, as if remembering something, she stopped and frowned. "Or, well... walk by, I guess...?"

While she was thinking about it, Vivian quickly moved on to Kaylie and Melanie, the last of the bunch. You hadn't noticed them before because they were sitting on the floor, while you were focusing on the two at the table - but once you've seen them, you double-take. Kaylie, who's head of security, is a lean, fit young woman between 13 and 14 feet tall, with shining silvery hair that goes down to her shoulders, and a set of kitty ears sticking out atop of it. She has long, slender limbs and perky curves, and the uniform she wears - a tighter, more form-fitting version of the other crewmates', dyed a deep black, - does absolutely nothing to disguise them. She sat with her knees out and feet together, a long, silvery cat's tail waving back and forth as she played with the girl in front of her.

The girl she was playing with was Melanie, the ship's quartermaster. At a glance, she must be around two feet tall and stood encircled in the gap made by Kaylie's legs, warding off the larger girl's hands and trying not to laugh as they tickled her. She has long, messy blond hair with matching mouse ears and tail, and a voluptuous build under the regular ship's uniform. She didn't answer when Vivian called their names, doubling over to catch her breath while Kaylie looked up and fixed you in a set of wide, golden-yellow cat's eyes.

In a flash, Kaylie had jumped onto the table to land in front of you, clearing the full distance and landing on all fours with hardly a sound. "Why, hello little one~" she purred, looming over you. You noticed her fingernails were black in color, and pointed. She leaned down until her face was right in front of you, still fixing you with that expressionless stare."H-hi," you stammered, stepping back.

Kaylie crept lazily forward to match you. "You're a lot bigger than my other toy~" she went on, and you realized she was actually purring. Before you could react, she'd opened her mouth to reveal a set of pointy white fangs, and darted forward to lick your face with a rough, pink tongue. You heard Vivian's laughter from behind you, and then her arm reached around to pull you back against her chest. "Alright, enough of that," said the fox. "Pinky here hasn't been treated yet, and I can't have him getting hurt. Besides," she grinned playfully, as her other hand came around to start petting you again. "He's not your toy..."

That won a hoot of laughter from Monica and a shy giggle from Bellatrix, while Kaylie turned indignantly and jumped back down to her original spot on the floor. "Hey!" Melanie objected. "That goes for me, too!" And then Kaylie sat down and picked her up in both hands. Ignoring the smaller girl's protests, she stretched out the top half of Melanie's suit and pulled it down to her waist, and then started purring again while licking all over her back and chest.

Moments later, the room went silent, as Captain Diana walked in flanked by the bear, skunk, and squirrel you recognized from earlier. Getting right down to business, all four of them sat down at the table, and Diana briefly went over the situation. Mostly she just repeated more of what you've already heard from Vivian, but when she mentions overseers, you get distracted by the sight of Vivian casually licking the back of her hand. She catches you staring and winks, making you flush with embarrassment, and you turn away to see that everybody's looking at you expectantly.

"Oh, um. Right." You fumble, trying to remember the question. "Overseer... yes. About that. Could mine be Vivian?" For a tense moment, the Captain says nothing, and you start worrying that you've been found out. Then she shrugs, and turns to Vivian. "Officer? Yes, I see you're fine with that arrangement. Very well, over to you then. But starting with the treatment, please. Wouldn't want to lose him."

The treatment, as Vivian explains while carrying you...

12312.content:
Vivian held you against her chest with one arm while walking, and while you tried to follow what she was saying as much as possible, it was hard to pay attention to words like "noninvasive subatomic energy transference" and "polyaromatic biomatrix formation" because, honestly, her boobs kept bouncing against your head. At one point, she stopped to ask you if you got the idea. Somewhat embarrassed, you told her that you didn't, and tried asking her to let you walk from here.

"Haha, nope!" She laughed. "As your Overseer, I'm responsible for your safety and all kinds of things could happen to a little guy like you down there!" She put on an exaggerated playful tone for the last part, like grown-ups use when they're talking to little kids, and used her other hand to shove your head against her breasts while she said it. You tried to resist, shouting out some muffled protests, but she easily laughed off your puny efforts and just kept walking.

When she finally let you up about another minute later, you were in a small (for her, anyway) room with a dial pad by the door, and a white circle marked out on the floor in the middle.

"Here's what you need to know" she says, gently setting you down on the floor by the circle in front of her. "The 'treatment' is a chemical process that will make you super tough and durable, but to do that, it has to use some of your body mass. You'll get smaller." She adds, as if you need an explanation.

"Yeah, I got that" you answer irritably. Your damn traitor dick had started hardening while she was smothering you with her tits, and you've been awkwardly half-crouching to conceal it, desperately wishing it to go away again, since she first put you down. Of course, first contact with a new sapient race was bound to lead to some... embarrassing misunderstandings. You tell yourself that that's all this is, and you should try to just power right through it. It may have seemed like the overseer was making advances on you, but that was probably just how it looked from a human perspective. That was probably perfectly normal behavior in their own culture... right?

"So you mean I'll burn some fat, or what?" You ask, only partly stalling. You're in pretty decent shape as it is, but if some super-advanced alien steroids were gonna burn another pound or two for you then hey, why not?

Unfortunately, Vivian shakes her head in answer. "Nope! Some of everything" she tells you. She puts her hands up and holds them, facing each other, about three feet apart. "Same proportions, smaller scale" she clarifies, moving the hands a little closer together as a demonstration.

At first you think you'd misunderstood, but then it hits you and you realize she's serious. "Smaller!?" You cry out in disbelief. "You want to make me even smaller!? That's crazy! How is that supposed to be safe? You're all friggin' huge next to me already! Bad enough if one of you trips and lands on me or something, as it is!" Vivian starts to lean down and reach out to grab you, but apparently thinks better of it and holds them up to make calming motions at you. She looks uncertain, like she doesn't know what kind of movement will set you off. You sigh. "Alright" you say, grudgingly calming down. "What?"

"Thank you. Look, it won't be that much smaller." Vivian tells you soothingly. "No telling exactly how much - it's different for everyone - but I lost about twenty percent of my body mass when I got it, and I'm an extreme case. Captain Diana, for example, she only lost four or five. That's about what most people lose. And as for safety-" she holds up a hand as you get ready to cut in, stopping you short. "In return, you'll get proportionally stronger, and exponentially more pressure-resistant. That includes impacts, strains, tears - even cuts, to some extent. As a bonus, you'll also get much better night vision and water retention, corrosion resistance, and metabolic activity. That means a drastic reduction in the amount of food and air you'll need to eat and breathe." She adds, seeing your reaction. You hesitate, and think for a moment. That actually sounds like a pretty good deal...

"Twenty percent?" You finally answer, after thinking over the pros and cons for a while. The way she was talking, you were basically about to get a bunch of superpowers from this treatment - what's another foot or so, when you're so much shorter than the rest of them already? Besides, you kind of doubt that they're really going to let you refuse. Captain's orders, after all. So you might as well try to get it done on your own terms...

"Twenty percent. Honest." Vivian holds her right hand up, in a comical impression of somebody taking an oath. "Like I said, I was an extreme case - but if you somehow lose more than I did, then I promise I'll have it reversed if you want. Okay?" "Fine," you sigh. "Now what?"

"You need to strip off your clothes and go stand in the middle of that circle."

"Wait, what?"

"Any clothing will get fused to your body if you're wearing it. Look we have miniature suits onboard, okay? Should be one or two that are small enough for you, afterwards."

After some coaxing, you grudgingly turn around and undress in front of Vivian, keeping your back turned towards her regardless. Suddenly cold and feeling increasingly awkward without your clothes, you start walking forward immediately without looking back, wanting to get this whole thing over with. You're pretty sure you can feel her leering at your back - and nothing can leer quite like a 13-foot-tall vixen.

So you imagine, anyway, as you stand in the middle of the sumo ring-sized circle and stare determinedly at the far wall. Suddenly there's a clamor above you and you look up, startled, to see a ceiling panel retract, revealing several large metal nozzles pointed straight in your direction. Without warning one of them starts hissing, and then everything goes dark.

BOOM. BOOM.

When you open your eyes, you're lying face down on the floor. You're groggy, and all your vision is blurry.

BOOM. BOOM.

There's a loud booming noise behind you. It's getting louder.

BOOM. BOOM.

Your head starts to clear, and your vision starts to focus. You start to climb onto your hands and knees, and then a massive, powerful red-colored fist swoops down from above and wraps around your torso. You're swept up and around in a blur, and then you stop, suspended in midair, in front of the incredibly enormous vision of your Overseer's grinning face.

All you can think is: 'Warm', as your head's still clearing. Her grip fits snugly under your arms and all the way down to your thighs, but your head, shoulders, and legs feel cold by comparison. Only when she's breathing in, though, since you're close enough to her face so that the hot air washes over you in a breeze whenever she exhales. It feels nice, you think.

All at once, you sober up and start to freak out.

"WELL, WELL!" Vivian's laughter booms out at you, as you start to panic and struggle wildly in her grip. "ISN'T THIS EXTRAORDINARY? YOU'RE EVen smaller than Melanie, now!" Halfway through, she seems to realize how loud she's sounding, and starts to soften her tone. She's right. You figure you're about a foot tall, give or take a couple inches.

"That was more than twenty percent!" You shout. "That was WAY more than twenty percent! Undo it! Change me back!" You stop flailing, and grab tightly with both hands to the index finger that she has wrapped around you, holding on and literally trying to get a grip. You had a deal. She would be reasonable. You just had to calm down and talk it over, and everything would be okay. This was just a temporary setback.

The look of mock innocence on her face was not helping you in this.

"Twenty percent?" She says innocently. "Silly Parker, that was WAY less than twenty percent of MY body mass! I said if you lose more THAN I DID, remember?" She laughs as you start shouting in protest, and effortlessly talks right over you as if she hadn't noticed. "AND BESIDES, WITH HOW EFFECTIVE THAT TREATMENT WAS, YOU MUST BE PRACTICALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE! HERE, WATCH THIS!"

Without asking for your permission, she grabs your right arm between a thumb and forefinger, and then pulls it from your shoulder. For a horrifying moment, you think it's going to tear off... but... it's fine? To your bewilderment, you see your arm pop out of its socket almost painlessly, feeling only the discomfort of the strain she's put on it by pulling. Then you watch as it stretches out over several times its length like a rubber band, before she lets go and sends it snapping back to its original shape. The impact knocks the wind out of you.

Within moments your arm's reformed, but Vivian still isn't done with you. Grabbing your legs with her free hand, she opens her grip around your waist, and then brings you up to her eye level for a closer look. "Hmm," she muses, examining your crotch. "Gosh, the little guy sure is shy isn't he? No wonder you were trying to hide him." She laughs. Your dick's shriveled up in fear.

"This'll make him come out!" She declares, suddenly pulling back the top of her spacesuit and dropping you inside. You land between her warm, soft, furry mounds before the suit snap back into place over you, leaving you in darkness. Immediately you fall down deeper as Vivian grabs her tits in either hand and pulls them apart, only to slam them back together again and squeeze. You have the breath forced out of your lungs and are left stuck to her left breast, flattened by the impact, as she pulls them apart again for round two.

"Wakey wakey, Little Parker!" Vivian sang, as she mashed her boobs together repeatedly. "And I hope you're a lot bigger than you look, or 'Big' Parker's going to have to fill in for the job." She added under her breath, knowing full well that you could hear. "Finally get a man on the ship, and he's fun-sized for my convenience!" She laughed as she left for...

123122.content:
As Vivian squashed you with her boobs over and over on her way back to the conference room, you came to notice that your eyes quickly got adjusted to the darkness in her cleavage much better than, you think, they actually should. There really isn't even any light at all getting through to you inside her essentially skintight suit, but on the rare occasions when you're able to peel your face away from her left breast before getting smashed back into it again, you're able to get a pretty clear (if dimly colored) picture of your surroundings. Like how you're hanging over empty space whenever the tits pull apart, for example, and that the only thing keeping you from falling right between them and down to her pelvis in those moments is the fact that the rest of your body's still flat and sticking to one of those tits. Well, that was certainly something worth thinking about.

At first it was terrible, because you hadn't got used to your new body yet and so you kept thinking that you were about to die. For instance, the pressure itself wasn't really painful - actually, your surroundings were really yielding and soft. But your brain wasn't used to the idea of your body feeling that much pressure without some kind of damage, and so it flooded your neurons with danger signals every time and caused you to panic, even though you didn't feel any actual harm being done (although feeling your bones pop out and bend and stretch like rubber was definitely pretty weird). Similarly, you didn't actually need to breathe - not as far as you could tell, anyway. But you were still trying to do so out of habit, and so you freaked out for a while when your couldn't inhale because your flattened lungs didn't have time to re-inflate between squeezes.

Once you realize you weren't actually in any danger at all, you're able to relax, and even secretly kind of start enjoying the ride. Okay, granted, downsides include: extremely bumpy ride, can't move, not getting a say in any of this, and really... weird sexual implications vis-a-vis involuntary & unsanctioned boner development while in unrestricted, full-body direct contact with foxfur.

On the plus side: warm, soft, squishy, boob-shaped... they're boobs! And they're huge! No one could blame you for appreciating that, you think. It sounds better if you think of your captor as more of a giant foxy alien than a giant alien fox, though you couldn't really say why. Fondling animals was weird; fondling aliens was just kinky. That's all there is to it.

Either way, you don't really have much time to think about it. It seems like you've just settled in when the ride stops, and you get momentarily blinded as the vixen pulls out her suit collar and peels you off of her tit, dragging you out into the light with your chest pinched between her fingers. As your eyes adjust to the sudden light you see she's standing in an empty hallway, just before the extra-large door that you recognize as leading to the conference room. Or one that looks just like it, anyway.

Vivian speaks to you cheerfully but using obviously hushed tones, as if she's trying not to get overheard. "Ooh, well look at that!" She whispers mischievously, pointing to your erection. You immediately try to hide it with your hands, stammering an apology and somehow feeling like you're the one at fault here. (You weren't, but in your experience there is never any justice in these circumstances.)

"Oh, come on now. Let me see" she grins, using one hand to hold your legs while the other one pins your arms above your head, "I helped make it, after all!" You give up struggling as she grins, realizing you're getting nowhere, and try pleading instead.

"Vivian, come on. This is unprofessional." You whine.

Vivian nods. "I agree" she says, suddenly serious. You sigh in relief, thinking you've finally made your point... But then she smiles and adds: "But I won't hold it against you. Lucky for you, MY people aren't so uptight about that kind of thing! It just shows you want to get off on me - so what?" She snorts. "You people lie to yourselves all the time, pretending not to be something that everybody knows you're all hard-wired to be." With a curious smile, she lightly knocks at your door. You remain still and silent inside. Not hearing any response, the anthro visitor tries the knob. To her surprise, the door swings open. You lower your head to your hands as you realize that in your panic and shock you neglected to secure the lock!

"Hello?" the squirrel woman asks gently, ducking her large body through the door frame. "I know I saw someone in here."

Her eyes scan the room and quickly fall on you. Her smile grows broader.

"Hey!" she squeals in excitement and moves toward you rapidly. You backpedal in fear, which surprises the woman.

"Aww, don't be scared of lil' ol' me!" she says happily. "I promise my friends and I are friendly. We aren't on some kind of conquest mission or nothin'," she says with a laugh. There is a distinct twang to the sound of her voice.

You look up at her imposing figure. "The....then why are you here?" you ask nervously.

She grabs your arm and drags you to the window of your ranger station, her friendly smile still clear on her face. "You see my friend Bella out there? The big one?" she asks you, indicating to the bear. You nod silently, uncertain about where this was going.

"Well, she's the youngest gal in our lil' group and today is her birthday!" she says happily. "It's a pretty big one too, just old enough to imbibe."

You give her a confused look. "Imbibe?" you ask.

She nods happily. "Yup! Finally able to join the party wherever, whenever. So we figured we'd take her out for a fancy celebration and cruise around the universe. Musta taken a wrong turn somewhere though, cause we ended up here!"

You could hardly believe your ears. These five anthro women were on some kind of alien 21-run! You looked back out the window and focused on the bear. Now that you are aware of it, you realize that she has a bit of a sway to her walk, as if she's had one too many drinks already. It was a look you were already pretty familiar with from the summer barbecues you've seen get out of hand at the park.

"But I'm so glad I found you! The party was gettin' kinda lame without any fellas around," the squirrel said. "You'll be popular with everyone, I'm sure. But we best hurry back before they all leave without me!"

Your mind freezes. This woman intends for you to be some kind of party toy for her tipsy friends! This can't end well for you. You don't even know the squirrel's name!

"Oh my gosh, all this time and I didn't even introduce myself. I'm Charlotte," she says with a smile. You are too stunned to manage a response, but she reads your name off your ranger uniform without skipping a beat. "Now let's get to it Parker. Let's see, what'd be the funnest way to introduce you to the party?" she ponders. Whatever she decides, you're in no position to resist.

You've had your fair share of nights well slept before, but this took it to a whole new level. You were awake, but your eyes refused to open, the comfiness of your surroundings too good to pull away from. You don't know what you did to your mattress, but right now it easily beat any higher end beds. Your whole body was surrounded in plush warmth, soft enough that your body just sank into the mattress, with the slightest hint of firmness to keep you on top. And then there were the pillows, best pillows you've ever had! You usually slept on just one pillow, but for some reason you had two tonight. You try to recollect when you managed to grab another pillow, but the soothing softness of your situation made you swiftly forget. Your pillows were just as warm as the mattress, and cradled your head perfectly to ensure maximum comfiness. Damn your bed was amazing right now, you couldn't help but get yourself deeper. You wrap your arms around as much of the mattress as possible, hugging yourself deeper while nuzzling your head deeper into the canyon between the two pillows. You wanted to struggle, but her softness added with the warmth of her voice sapped any notion of resistance. She seemed nice enough, for some reason you knew she wouldn't hurt you. Soon enough, the memories of your first encounter started replaying in your mind.

"Oh yeah, I remember now, sorry about that Rose."

Rose simply chuckled, waving off your apology, "No reason to be sorry sweetie, you just woke up. Speaking of which, you slept longer than I did! And people say Snorlaxes are heavy sleepers!"

"Huh, guess I did fall asleep...Hey, where are we?"

Rose simply used her arm to guide my head toward a window, we were in space!!! Well duh, she came from a UFO, that was obvious.

"My group is in charge of finding and preserving different kinds of flora all across the universe, though I have to say, Earth's flowers are my favorite. They also have cute boys too."

You blushed at her kind words, deciding to return them in kind. "W-Well you're cute too!"

"Ooh! And they're gentlemen too! It's not exactly in our mission statement, but from time to time we pick up some cuties along the way to keep us company for a bit. Say the word and I'll bring you right back home...unless you want to stay with me of course."

As she says this, Rose lowers the arm wrapped around you until it's on your rear. She then presses you down, making you give her belly a little hump. So she did feel you down there, it wasn't your fault! Any guy who was wrapped in tits bigger than their own head would do the same thing!

Trying to change the subject, you mention something she talked about. "You said something about others on the ship, don't you think I should meet them?"

Rose's demeanor quickly changed, her usual calm soothing self became nervous, it was obvious there was something she wasn't telling you.

"Well I would hold off on that for a bit longer, mostly because..."

info.brief_description: A squashing interactive based on Falcon's story "Anthros From Space" - Now with Pokemon!
info.description:
First, if you haven't read Falcon's great interactive "Anthros From Space", I'd recommend it. You can find the link here:

https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1976512-Anthros-from-Space

I was having a conversation with Falcon about his preferences for his story and he prefers minimal squashing interaction. It's a great story without squashing, but he was kind enough to give me the OK to make a spin off with some of the chapters already in his story and take the basic foundation for his interactive for a Squashing focused story, which is what you see here.

The base concept is the same. You are a human who is visited by Anthro's from another planet. They have plans on taking you to their home world. Here are a few rules to keep in mind:

- The human earthling should always be male and always at least 18 years old.

- The alien anthros should always be female, at least any that are interacting with the primary character.

- While this is a squashing themed story, any type of smothering or dominating is allowed and encouraged with a few exceptions: NO toilet interaction and do not kill the main character, even if he's submitted to an experience that normally would kill him.

- Even if the anthros are based on animals that would normally be smaller than a human, for the purposes of this story let's keep them around Amazonian size at least.

- No short one/two line chapters and try to keep choice chapters to a minimum.

- I've deleted the humanoid alien option and replaced it with an anthro pokemon option. The humanoid option didn't get any traction, I'm hoping this one gets more.

That's really about it for now. I reserve the right to add to this if necessary. Please enjoy!
